There are a lot of items that can make Veigar borderline useless. Riot wanted to Nerf support Veigar and have instead hit mid veigar very hard. He isn't really bad now, instead he just is an incomplete champion. They were very determined to put all his power into his Q and left  the rest of him untouched or nerfed. From a balance stand point, veigar is fine. From a keeping a champions identity standpoint, riot failed this miserably. He is not a fun champ to play anymore. And instead of just adding weaknesses to him without removing the old ones, they should have actually invested some time and made him feel like a full champion rather than one held together with used band aids and tacky glue.
They didn't just want to nerf the support. That stun was bullshit.
Imo the problem is that they nerfed his stupid strong stun into nothing more than a zoning tool and ignored the consequences that would have on his w

The {{item:3020}} MP would cancel out most of the enemy's {{item:3111}} and kill them. Getting the {{item:3135}}  would even more destroy their MR and nuke them as easy as pie.

its not the MR on the merc threads that counter him it the tenacity and added movement speed... tenacity shortens his stun by 35% allowing to dodge his W and the added ms helps you avoid his stun and skill-shots in general

For all that everyone is complaining about his stun, not only was it broken as fuck before, but nobody is complaining about Ekko's W which takes 3 seconds to arm. As someone who played Veigar back in a semi-manageable meta (about 5.4), I never really had a problem landing his stun. Just place it behind the enemy and they either walk into it or face your Q and R, which if you know how to cs with Q, will chunk them.

Very different situations, Ekko has survivability outside of his w, q slows, passive slows + ms boost to run away, e double jump, ult teleport. Veigar on the other hand has only his stun. 

Not mention Ekko's stuns everything in its fairly large radius for the same duration as a rank 4 veigar stun at rank 1 + gives ekko a big ass shield even if he misses the stun. Veigar's stun on the other hand only affects those who run into its walls. 

Ekko does not require his stun to land his damage, veigar does. 

> Just place it behind the enemy and they either walk into it or face your Q and R, which if you know how to cs with Q, will chunk them.

Thats the thing, as a squishy front loaded bust mage you dont want to chunk people you want to kill them, if you've blown all your cd's and the enemy is still alive you have nothing to stop them turning around and murdering you.

Hypothetical 1: Veigar catches jinx alone, jinx has 0 defence items and veigar is a burst mage. Veigar throws down his cage. Jinx turns around and starts autoing veigars face, W is not going to land so you throw out r q. It "chunks" jinx. Jinx proceeds to kill veigar and live another day.

Hypothetical 2: Leblanc catches jinx alone, jinx has 0 defence items and leblanc is a burst mage. Leblanc full combo's and jinx dies.

Hypothetical 3: Annie catches jinx alone, jinx has 0 defence items and annie is a burst mage. Annie full combo's and jinx dies.

It is not up to veigar if his combo lands, it is up to the enemy.
Veig's my main for mid, so unfortunately those tactics don't work on me. Probably on inexperienced veigar players
Yea, to play veigar properly now, you need to assume that you'll never land a meteor, and just focus on poking them down with Qs.

Really you don't poke with q. You just farm with it. You just hold your own for a while. For those who don't know whenever his q kills a minion/monster he gets bonus Ap. Bonus ap is higher for champions and applies if he kills from any dmg source.
